mapper.sql: item_id, use_id, equipment_id, main_param_name, main_param_value, equipment_num, equipment_effect, equipment_position, remarks, status, code, plan_use_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO el_use_item( use_id, equipment_id, main_param_name, main_param_value, equipment_num, equipment_effect, equipment_position, remarks, status, code, plan_use_id ) VALUES (#{useId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mainParamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainParamValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{equipmentEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{planUseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
UPDATE el_use_item
use_id = #{useId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
main_param_name = #{mainParamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_param_value = #{mainParamValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_num = #{equipmentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
equipment_effect = #{equipmentEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_position = #{equipmentPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_use_id = #{planUseId,jdbc=BIGINT},
WHERE item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM el_use_item WHERE item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND status != 99
